short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an UNOFFICIAL Disqus extension that allows you to use Disqus on any site by clicking the extension icon to open a popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Leave comments on any webpage where each webpage is its own unique Disqus thread.
